data.name: Worldometers.info Corona Dark Covid-19 edition
data.description:
This is the Corona Dark Covid-19 edition for Worldometers.info Steps on how to use User styles - 1. Visit 'Stylus' Brave/Chrome extension https://greasyfork.org/en/help/installing-user-styles 2. Click on 'Install as user style' button 3. Stylus will then handle user styles according to preferences
Worldometers is run by an international team of developers, researchers, and volunteers with the goal of making world statistics available in a thought-provoking and time relevant format to a wide audience around the world. It is published by a small and independent digital media company based in the United States. They have no political, governmental, or corporate affiliation.
Brought to you by curvy.one

data.name: Moo Aesthetic
Gyakorikérdések - 3
Peopleware (Pplware) - NtmStyle
data.description:
ATTENTION!!!
This Script is OUTDATED and discontinued!!!
==================================================

This Script changes the way we see the site Peopleware (Pplware) [ http://pplware.sapo.pt ]

I do not say that this is a better way, i only say it is my way!
The style are optimized for 1024 pixels width minimum, this is not a problem since the original site is the same.

--- Screens taken with (v2.000) --- Sorry none of the screens are up. ---
HomePage
- Style Off [Size = ~2100KB | Pixels = 1001x6979] > link = http://goo.gl/LZdwr
- Style On [Size = ~1687KB | Pixels = 1001x5258 (save 1721 vertical pixels)] > link = http://goo.gl/NfEok
SinglePost
- Style Off [Size = ~1538KB | Pixels = 1001x14140] > link = http://goo.gl/78xr0
- Style On [Size = ~961KB | Pixels = 1001x6741 (save 7399 vertical pixels)] > link = http://goo.gl/fAlSH

data.name: http://doramy.club (Dark)
Gyakorikérdések 1 by Anita
Shell Extension City - QuickStyle
data.description:
ATTENTION!!!
This Script is discontinued and may become outdated.
==================================================

This is an old style I made for the site: http://shellcity.net

One I never publish until today. It's a very basic alternative color scheme and other small adjustments I like, but nothing major, except maybe that the minimum wide in pixels that I recommend to use with this style is 1250 or more.

Screen taken with (v1.010)

data.name: Dark LinkedIn by GexideL
data.description: Dark theme for LinkedIn. This theme is updated once a week! If you find any imperfections please write below in discussion.
data.css:

}

.forum-filter-bar .forum-filter-dropdown .forum-filter-submit

:focus,

{

}

.feed-update-list__inline-recommendation-card,
.launchpad-pymk-list__item
{

}
.linkedin-text path,
.linkedin-text polygon,
.toast__dismiss-icon
{

}
.settings-container
{
    min-width:1159px;
}
#settings-nav.sticky-on
{
    padding:0 15px;
}
.entity-card.feed
{
    padding:15px;
}
#layout-main
{
    margin-top:0px !important;
}
li.profile-result-card
{
    margin-left:0px;
}
#global-alert-queue,
.tenor-gif__footer,
.content-container.hc-answer button.submit-button
{

}
.li-footer__copy-logo.lazy-loaded,
.profile-result-card__companies-icon,
.profile-result-card__schools-icon,
.hc-answer .collapsible .collapsible-header:before,
.social-action-bar__button img
{

}
.mn-connections .dropdown-trigger
{
    background-color:transparent !important;
}
.topics-body__header,
.recommendation-carousel-card--disabled:after
{
    background-image:none;
}
.me-menu__dropdown-item:hover
{
    cursor:pointer;
}
.entity-item.ember-view a.full-width:hover
{
    text-decoration:none;
}
}

data.name: Gmail AttachmentIcons - NtmVersion
data.description:
ATTENTION!!!
This Script is OUTDATED and discontinued!!!
==================================================

Another Gmail Attachment Icons style!

- This style use the system icons, so i do not provide any screens.
- It puts icons in inbox zone, inside mail and some in the new attachments zone!
- Supports 142 extensions types and 10 'gType' formats.

note: If you want some specific extension or 'gType' that is not present in this script please say something in the discussions. I will, probably, include your request in my next update!
ps: I may do this script from scratch again but I don't promise anything.

data.description:
ATTENTION!!!
This Script is OUTDATED and discontinued!!!
==================================================

This is just a simple style for: http://youtube.com

Note: This is NOT a SKIN!

Objective: Make both sizes of the player bigger!

--- No screens, sorry, but try it you may like it ---
